title: #155: The 2014 Gay Super Bowl; The Oscars (@SchmoesKnow)
itunes:title: The 2014 Gay Super Bowl; The Oscars with Schmoes Know
description: The Schmoes, Kristian Harloff and Mark Ellis, met me at the Comedy Store for a second straight year to have fun and talk about the Oscars. It's the funnest way you'll find to get ready for your Oscar party (home alone in your underwear with General Tso's chicken sauce on your chest). This is such fun conversation that barely relates to the Oscars at all. And of course we got interrupted by Pauly again.
